nodes.text: Vara-Sol was a male Voss commando living on Voss during the Galactic War. Disobeying the order to avoid the Nightmare Lands, he and a few other commandos ventured into the forbidden territory and were corrupted by the darkness within. The Voss asked an accomplished outsider to follow their trail and put the corrupted out of their misery, which was accomplished by 3640 BBY.
Vara-Sol appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as one of four NPC required to kill for the heroic "Cleanse the Corrupted".
